item.title: By: leib

item.description: Do you recommend only R. Ephraim Goldstein's shiurim, or do you recommend all four of the lecturers in the section? Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Do you recommend only R. Ephraim Goldstein’s shiurim, or do you recommend all four of the lecturers in the section? Thanks.
